summary: Backend UserProfile was extended with an optional avatar field and the frontend profile setup modal and My Profile page were updated to handle avatar preview/upload/removal using fileToDataUrl. A backend migration module was also added, which was not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Candid interface accordingly so the frontend generated types include the new avatar field.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the Motoko type change in backend/main.mo, but does not show any explicit Candid/interface or generated-types update; it may be automatic, but there is no direct evidence in the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend state migration module and applied it via `(with migration = Migration.run)` to backfill existing profiles with `avatar = null`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request a migration mechanism or additional backend files; it only required extending the model and APIs.
